tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Green_Building_Compliance_Documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(255),
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    created_date TIMESTAMP,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE GreenBuildingDocuments (
    document_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(100),
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    date_created TIMESTAMP,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE BuildingOwners (
    owner_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    owner_name VARCHAR(100),
    building_address VARCHAR(150),
    contact_email VARCHAR(50),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Compliance_Documents (
 document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 document_name VARCHAR(255),
 document_type VARCHAR(50),
 document_date DATE,
 project_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Green_Building_Projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Compliance_Checklist (
 checklist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 checklist_item VARCHAR(255),
 checklist_status VARCHAR(50),
 document_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (document_id) REFERENCES Compliance_Documents(document_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Building_Owners (
 owner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 owner_name VARCHAR(255),
 owner_email VARCHAR(255),
 project_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Green_Building_Projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE GreenBuildingProjects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_location VARCHAR(255),
    total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceDocuments (
    doc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    doc_name VARCHAR(255),
    doc_type VARCHAR(50),
    project_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES GreenBuildingProjects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Contractors (
    contractor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contractor_name VARCHAR(255),
    contractor_company VARCHAR(255),
    contractor_email VARCHAR(255),
    project_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES GreenBuildingProjects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Inspections (
    inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspection_type VARCHAR(50),
    inspector_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES GreenBuildingProjects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Violations (
    violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    violation_date DATE,
    violation_description TEXT,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES GreenBuildingProjects(project_id)
);
